L'Oreal Paris Revitalift Derm Intensives 2.5% [hyaluronic Acid + Caffeine] Eye Serum

Brand: L'Oréal Paris

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: AQUA/WATER EAU, GLYCERIN, HYDROXYETHYLPIPERAZINE ETHANE SULFONIC ACID, NACINAMIDE, SODIUM HYALURONATE, CAFFEINE, CITRIC ACID, HYDROXYACETOPHENONE, TRISODIUM ETHYLENEDIAMINE DISUCCINATE, ASCORBYL GLUCO

NATE, ASCORBYL GLUCOSIDE, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, CHLORPHENESIN

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
